Name: Scaraboid
Description: Steatite scaraboid with back in the form of a human head, hair indicated by cross-hatching, and the underside incised with a scene of the sun-disk over an obelisk flanked by two worshipping baboons. The scene can be read as a cryptic writing of the name of the god Amun-Re, a motif common on scarabs and scaraboids from the New Kingdom to the Late Period.
